mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id AND rm.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id AND m.is_deleted = 0 WHERE u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.username = #{username} AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_value ASC
